gradSlaterDetAux *  dX 
)

Definition at line 85 of file Communication.c.

References SlaterDet::A, gradSlaterDetAux::dGaux, gradSlaterDetAux::dno, gradSlaterDetAux::ngauss, and SQR.

{
  MPI_Bcast(&dX->ngauss, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  MPI_Bcast(dX->dGaux, SQR(dX->ngauss)*sizeof(gradGaussianAux),
            MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  MPI_Bcast(dX->dno, Q->A*dX->ngauss*sizeof(gradGaussian),
            MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
}

void BroadcastInteraction ( Interaction *  Int  ) 

use MPI Broadcast to distribute Interaction parameters slaves allocate space for Interaction labels are not broadcastet

slaves allocate space for Interaction labels are not broadcastet

Definition at line 97 of file Communication.c.

References Interaction::c, mpirank, and Interaction::ncomponents.

Referenced by main(), MinimizerprojSlave(), MinimizerSlave(), MinimizerSlaveod(), and ProjectionSlave().

{
  if (mpirank == 0) {
    // send
    MPI_Bcast(Int, sizeof(Interaction), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    MPI_Bcast(Int->c, Int->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent),
              MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  } else {
    // receive
    MPI_Bcast(Int, sizeof(Interaction), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    Int->c = malloc(Int->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent));
    MPI_Bcast(Int->c, Int->ncomponents*sizeof(InteractionComponent),
              MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  }
  
}

    // send
    MPI_Bcast(par, size, MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  } else {
    // receive
    MPI_Bcast(par, size, MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  }

void BroadcastSlaterDet ( SlaterDet *  Q  ) 

Definition at line 45 of file Communication.c.

References SlaterDet::A, G, SlaterDet::G, SlaterDet::idx, mpirank, ng, SlaterDet::ng, and SlaterDet::ngauss.

Referenced by calcgradPotentialmpi(), calcgradPotentialodmpi(), calcPotentialmpi(), calcPotentialodmpi(), calcprojectedMBMEmpi(), calcprojectedMBMEsmpi(), calcprojectedMultiMBMEmpi(), DiagonalDensityHOSlave(), FormfactorSlave(), MinimizerprojSlave(), MinimizerSlave(), MinimizerSlaveod(), OneNucleonOvlapsSlave(), ProjectionSlave(), and TwoNucleonOvlapsSlave().

{
  if (mpirank == 0) {
    // send
    MPI_Bcast(Q, sizeof(SlaterDet), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    MPI_Bcast(Q->idx, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    MPI_Bcast(Q->ng, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    MPI_Bcast(Q->G, Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian), 
              MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
  } else {
    int* idx = Q->idx; 
    int* ng = Q->ng;
    Gaussian* G = Q->G;

    MPI_Bcast(Q, sizeof(SlaterDet), MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    Q->idx = idx;
    Q->ng = ng;
    Q->G = G;
    MPI_Bcast(Q->idx, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    MPI_Bcast(Q->ng, Q->A, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    MPI_Bcast(Q->G, Q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian), 
              MPI_BYTE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
    
  }
}
